spec_data.Name: sergueis-destiny
spec_data.Description:
A bad wizard Blackmagic has cast his evil spell to the peaceful village
Jolimy. 50 years later, an apprentice sorcerer Serguei must break the
Blackmagic's spell and free Jolimy.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Thu 27 Jul 2017 05:57:56 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Serguei's Destiny, an AGI adventure game
